title: Canaveral National Seashore: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution         Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,,            Beach Saftety Tips  Alert 2 , Severity ,caution ,, Beach Saftety Tips  What you need to know to stay safe and keep the people you care about safe at the beach... more     Information        Apollo Beach Road Closure - Eldora Loop and Parking Area #5  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Apollo Beach Road Closure - Eldora Loop and Parking Area #5  Road Closure notice for Parking area #5 and Eldora Loop in Apollo Beach. more          Apollo Boat Ramp Closure  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Apollo Boat Ramp Closure  Apollo boat ramp & adjacent parking area will be closed May 10-12 for road resurfacing. more          Extended Summer Hours Resume March 20th  Alert 3 , Severity ,information ,, Extended Summer Hours Resume March 20th  Canaveral National Seashore will resume the extended summer hours schedule on March 20th, and will be open daily from 6:00 am to 8:00 pm. more          Change to Island Camping Reservation System  Alert 4 , Severity ,information ,, Change to Island Camping Reservation System  Beginning at 10:00 am EST January 8,2016, backcountry island camping reservations and permits must be obtained using www.recreation.gov or by calling 1(877) 444-6777. more
